00008 static int GetFlashStatus32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *Status)
00009 {
00010     int res = 0;
00011     uint32_t reg32;
00012 
00013 
00014         // Enable flash
00015     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle,Flash->Sel_Flash,Flash->FlashEnable);
00016         // Status read Command
00017         reg32 = STATUS_READ_CMD;
00018         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, reg32);
00019         // Status read
00020         res |= CAENVME_ReadRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, &reg32);
00021         // Disable flash 
00022         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, !Flash->FlashEnable);
00023         *Status = (uint8_t)(reg32 & 0xFF);
00024 
00025     return res;
00026 
00027 }

00030 // *****************************************************************************
00031 // GetFlashStatus: read the status register of the flash
00032 // Parameters: Status: pointer to the Status variable
00033 // Return: 0 on Success, < 0 on error
00034 // *****************************************************************************
00035 static int GetFlashStatus(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *Status) {
00036 
00037   int ret;
00038 
00039     ret = GetFlashStatus32(Flash, Status);
00040 
00041   return ret;    
00042     
00043 }

00046 static int WriteFlashPage32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum)
00047 {
00048     unsigned int i;
00049     int res = 0;
00050     uint8_t stat;
00051     uint32_t flash_addr;
00052         uint32_t reg32;
00053 
00054         if (Flash->PageSize == 264)  // 4 and 8 Mbit
00055                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 9;
00056         else if (Flash->PageSize == 528)  // 16 and 32 Mbit
00057                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 10;
00058         else  // 64 Mbit
00059                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 11;
00060 
00061         reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable; 
00062         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);
00063         // Enable flash 
00064     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00065 
00066     // Opcode
00067     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, MAIN_MEM_PAGE_PROG_TH_BUF1_CMD); 
00068 
00069         // Page address
00070 
00071     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle,Flash->RW_Flash, (flash_addr>>16) & 0xFF); 
00072 
00073     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle,Flash->RW_Flash, (flash_addr>>8) & 0xFF); 
00074 
00075     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle,Flash->RW_Flash, flash_addr & 0xFF); 
00076 
00077     // Fill buffer
00078     for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++) {
00079                 res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle,Flash->RW_Flash, data[i]); 
00080     }
00081 
00082     // Disable flash 
00083    reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable; 
00084         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);
00085 
00086     // wait for Tep (Time of erase and programming)
00087         do 
00088                 res |= GetFlashStatus(Flash, &stat);
00089         while (!(stat & 0x80));
00090 
00091     return res;
00092 }

00095 static int ReadFlashPage32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum)
00096 {
00097     unsigned int i;
00098     int res = 0;
00099     uint32_t flash_addr;
00100     uint32_t Rbuff;
00101         uint32_t reg32;
00102     int  rcnt = 0;
00103 
00104         if (Flash->PageSize == 264)       // 4 and 8 Mbit
00105                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 9;
00106         else if (Flash->PageSize == 528)  // 16 and 32 Mbit
00107                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 10;
00108         else                              // 64 Mbit
00109                 flash_addr = (uint32_t)pagenum << 11;
00110 
00111     reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable; 
00112         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);    
00113         // Enable flash
00114     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00115 
00116         // Opcode
00117 
00118    res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, MAIN_MEM_PAGE_READ_CMD); 
00119         // Page address
00120 
00121     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, (flash_addr>>16) & 0xFF); 
00122 
00123     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, (flash_addr>>8) & 0xFF); 
00124 
00125     res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, flash_addr & 0xFF); 
00126         // additional don't care bytes
00127     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00128                 res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, 0);  
00129     }
00130 
00131     // Read Flash Page
00132     rcnt = 0;
00133     for (i=0; i<Flash->PageSize; i++) {
00134                 CAENVME_ReadRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, &Rbuff);
00135                 data[i] = (uint8_t) Rbuff;
00136     }
00137 
00138         // Disable flash 
00139     reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable; 
00140         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);
00141 
00142     return res;
00143 }

00146 static int ReadFlashSecurityReg32(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data)
00147 {
00148   int i;
00149   int res = 0;
00150   uint32_t data32[2048];
00151   uint32_t reg32;
00152 
00153   reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable;
00154   res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);
00155   // enable flash (NCS = 0)
00156   res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, Flash->FlashEnable);
00157 
00158   // write opcode
00159   reg32 = AT45_READ_SECURITY_REGISTER_OPCODE;
00160   res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, reg32);
00161   // additional don't care bytes
00162   reg32 = 0;
00163   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00164       res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash, reg32);
00165 
00166   // read flash page
00167   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00168       res |= CAENVME_ReadRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->RW_Flash,(data32+i));
00169 
00170   // disable flash (NCS = 1)
00171   reg32 = !Flash->FlashEnable;
00172   res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(Flash->Handle, Flash->Sel_Flash, reg32);
00173   for (i=0; i<AT45_IDREG_LENGTH; i++) 
00174           data[i] = (uint8_t)data32[i];
00175 
00176   return res;
00177 }

00182 // Parameters: data: pointer to the data buffer
00183 //             pagenum: flash page number

00185 // *****************************************************************************
00186 int WriteFlashPage(cvFlashAccess *Flash, uint8_t *data, int pagenum) {
00187 
00188   int ret;
00189 
00190     ret = WriteFlashPage32(Flash, data, pagenum);
00191 
00192   return ret;
